EmailTemplate.subject: Deploy Kubernetes and KNative in Production Now with Pivotal
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
With KubeCon behind us, now is the time to accelerate your cloud-native transformation and by deploying Kubernetes in production with enterprise-ready technology from Pivotal and VMware. The CNCF ecosystem is exploding with potential but also complexity. Let Pivotal help you navigate your company’s course to delivering business value.
Building on the proven foundations of Pivotal Cloud Foundry (PCF) and integrated directly into your existing VMware infrastructure and public clouds, Pivotal Container Service (PKS) is your easy-button for enterprise Kubernetes.
We also announced initial availability the Pivotal Function Service <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/the-first-open-multi-cloud-serverless-platform-for-the-enterprise-is-here-try-out-pivotal-function-service-today?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-kubecon-us-seattle-q418]]> (PFS), one of the first commercial offerings of KNative, providing a full function Function-as-a-Service platform for deployment on-premises and in the cloud.
- VIDEO: Knative, riff, and Pivotal Function Service <[[https://content.pivotal.io/youtube-uberflip/mark-fisher-pivotal-springone-platform-2018?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-kubecon-us-seattle-q418]]>
The momentum around Pivotal’s award winning <[[https://www.crn.com/rankings-and-lists/ti2018-details.htm?c=55]]> Pivotal Container Service <[[https://pivotal.io/platform/pivotal-container-service?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-kubecon-us-seattle-q418]]> (PKS) continues to accelerate, as demonstrated by the news, customer talks and technical break-out sessions at the conference. The KubeCon videos are now posted <[[https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLj6h78yzYM2PZf9eA7bhWnIh_mK1vyOfU]]> but here are a few of our favorites from the past few months:
- VIDEO: How T-Mobile Build and Scaled Kubernetes On-Prem for the 2018 Retail Season <[[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1qcTu2QUtrU&index=251&t=0s]]> - VIDEO: What’s new with PKS and emerging use cases <[[https://videos.vmworld.com/global/2018/videoplayer/17639]]> - VIDEO: Kubernetes: One Cluster or Many? <[[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=a1ORgUtOeis]]> - VIDEO: Operating and Managing Kubernetes on Day 2 with PKS <[[https://videos.vmworld.com/global/2018/videoplayer/22744]]> - VIDEO: Bring your traditional application to Kubernetes with PKS <[[https://videos.vmworld.com/global/2018/videoplayer/18375]]>
We also invite you to take advantage of our growing library of resources <[[https://content.pivotal.io/pivotal-container-service-pks?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-kubecon-us-seattle-q418]]> and specifically these <[[https://content.pivotal.io/kubecon-2018?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-kubecon-us-seattle-q418]]> to help you on your Kubernetes journey, whatever stage you’re in.
Kubernetes will likely be showing up in your IT portfolio soon, so set yourself up for success with PKS from Pivotal. Best Regards, The Pivotal Team
